{"step_by_step_thinking": "Collagen is a fibrous protein that is found in connective tissues such as skin, tendons, and ligaments. It is known to be one of the most abundant proteins in the human body. However, before confirming if collagen is the most abundant human protein, we need to consider other proteins as well. Some other abundant proteins in the human body include actin, myosin, and hemoglobin. To determine if collagen is the most abundant protein, we would need to compare the quantities of these proteins in the body.", "answer_choice": "B"}
